participant_1.background:
I want a home that is safe and comfortable for my family.
i like ford cars.
I'm proud of my work as an upholsterer and the commissions I've received from comic book artists.
I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
I love listening to music that reminds me of a time and place when things were simpler.

i am six feet tall.
I am not sure what my ethnic background is
we lived in virginia while i was growing up.
i like to drink tea.

content.text: Hello! I am doing well, thank you for asking. How are you today?
I am doing well, too! I just got home from a concert last night.
Oh, how was it? What band did you see?
I was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
That is awesome! I am sure you looked great.
Thank you! I am proud of my work as an upholsterer and the commissions I've received from comic book artists.
That is very impressive! Do you do a lot of work with leather?
Not as much as I would like to. I am really good at working with fabric and vinyl.
That is still really cool! I like to make things out of fabric, too.
Oh, really? What kind of things do you make?
I mostly make bags and purses. I also like to make pillows and blankets.
That is really cool! I would love to see some of your work sometime.
That would be fun! I could bring some of my things to our next meeting.
That would be awesome! I would love to see them
